text:
Le Tote is hiring Engineers and Product folks to help change the way women shop! We're hiring:

- Full Stack Engineers (Ruby on Rails) - Front End Engineer - Director of Product - Lead Ruby Engineer + more!

We offer competitive salaries, equity, catered Tuesday lunches, fully stocked Kitchen, dog friendly offices and most important, an awesome team! Check out all of our listings at https://jobs.lever.co/letote or contact Cindy a/t letote d/o/t com for more info.
